mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT( CONCAT( ( select prmt_parametro FROM tbl_parametro_prmt WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_parametro_dato_prdt WHERE EXISTS ( select 1 FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_pk = prdt_prvr_pk AND srvc_fref BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, srvc_fref) AND prvr_prmt_pk = srvc_subp_pk ) AND prdt_prmt_pk = prmt_pk and prdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('REC_ADU') ) ) , SUBSTRING(srvc_anno FROM 4) ) , CONCAT('5', srvc_numero) ) AS numero FROM tbl_servicio_srvc srvc WHERE srvc_pk = #{value}
mapper.update:
UPDATE tbl_servicio_srvc SET srvc_estado = ( WITH sql AS ( SELECT ssrv_estado FROM tbl_subservicio_ssrv WHERE ssrv_tpss_pk = getEntidad('ATRAQUE') AND ssrv_srvc_pk = srvc_pk ) SELECT CASE WHEN 'I' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) THEN 'I'
WHEN 'C' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) AND NOT 'F' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) THEN 'C'
WHEN ( 'C' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) OR 'S' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) ) AND 'F' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) THEN 'I'
WHEN 'S' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) AND NOT 'F' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) THEN 'S'
WHEN 'F' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) THEN 'F'
WHEN 'D' = ANY (SELECT ssrv_estado FROM sql) THEN 'D'
ELSE 'A' END ) WHERE srvc_pk = #{value}

UPDATE tbl_servicio_dato_srdt SET srdt_cadena = ( WITH sql AS ( SELECT ssdt_cadena FROM tbl_subservicio_dato_ssdt WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_subservicio_ssrv WHERE ssrv_pk = ssdt_ssrv_pk and ssrv_srvc_pk = srdt_srvc_pk AND ssrv_tpss_pk = getEntidad('ATRAQUE') ) AND ssdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('COD_EXEN') ) SELECT CASE WHEN '0' = ANY (SELECT ssdt_cadena FROM sql) OR ( '1' = ANY (SELECT ssdt_cadena FROM sql) AND '2' = ANY (SELECT ssdt_cadena FROM sql) ) THEN '0'
WHEN '1' = ANY (SELECT ssdt_cadena FROM sql) THEN '1'
WHEN '2' = ANY (SELECT ssdt_cadena FROM sql) THEN '2'
WHEN '3' = ANY (SELECT ssdt_cadena FROM sql) THEN '3'
ELSE NULL END ) WHERE srdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('COD_EXEN') AND srdt_srvc_pk = #{value}

UPDATE tbl_servicio_dato_srdt srdtNav SET srdt_prmt_pk = ( SELECT prmt_pk FROM tbl_parametro_prmt WHERE prmt_tppr_pk = getTipoDato('TIPO_NAVEGACION') AND prmt_parametro = ( WITH unlo AS ( SELECT srdt_prmt_pk as unlo_pk , srvc_fref , SUBSTRING(prmt_parametro FROM 1 FOR 2) as pais_codigo , prdt_prmt_pk as unlo_pais_pk , ( SELECT prdt_nentero FROM tbl_parametro_dato_prdt WHERE prdt_prvr_pk = prvr_pk AND prdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('BOOLEANO_01') ) as unlo_insular , ( SELECT prdt_nentero FROM tbl_parametro_dato_prdt WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_pk = prdt_prvr_pk AND prvr_prmt_pk = unlo_pais.prdt_prmt_pk AND srvc_fref BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, getSysDatetime()) ) AND prdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('BOOLEANO_01') ) as pais_ue , ( SELECT prdt_prmt_pk FROM tbl_parametro_dato_prdt WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_pk = prdt_prvr_pk AND prvr_prmt_pk = srvc_subp_pk AND srvc_fref BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, getSysDatetime()) ) AND prdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('UNLOCODE') ) as unlo_subp_servicio FROM tbl_servicio_dato_srdt srdtLoc join tbl_servicio_srvc ON srvc_pk = srdt_srvc_pk join tbl_parametro_prmt unlo ON prmt_pk = srdt_prmt_pk join tbl_parametro_version_prvr unlo_version ON prvr_prmt_pk = prmt_pk AND srvc_fref BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, getSysDatetime()) JOIN tbl_parametro_dato_prdt unlo_pais ON prdt_prvr_pk = prvr_pk AND prdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('PAIS') WHERE srdtLoc.srdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('UNLOCODE_2') AND srdtLoc.srdt_srvc_pk = srdtNav.srdt_srvc_pk ) SELECT CASE WHEN pais_codigo = 'ES' THEN CASE WHEN unlo_pk = unlo_subp_servicio THEN 'I'
WHEN unlo_insular = 1 THEN 'CI'
ELSE 'C' END
WHEN pais_ue = 1 THEN 'EC'
ELSE 'E' END AS tipo_navegacion FROM unlo ) ) WHERE srdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('TIPO_NAV') AND srdt_srvc_pk = #{value}

UPDATE tbl_servicio_dato_srdt srdtNav SET srdt_prmt_pk = ( SELECT prmt_pk FROM tbl_parametro_prmt WHERE prmt_tppr_pk = getEntidad('TIPO_NAVEGACION') AND prmt_parametro = ( WITH unlo AS ( SELECT srdt_prmt_pk as unlo_pk , srvc_fref , SUBSTRING(prmt_parametro FROM 1 FOR 2) as pais_codigo , prdt_prmt_pk as unlo_pais_pk , ( SELECT prdt_nentero FROM tbl_parametro_dato_prdt WHERE prdt_prvr_pk = prvr_pk AND prdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('BOOLEANO_01') ) as unlo_insular , ( SELECT prdt_nentero FROM tbl_parametro_dato_prdt WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_pk = prdt_prvr_pk AND prvr_prmt_pk = unlo_pais.prdt_prmt_pk AND srvc_fref BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, getSysDatetime()) ) AND prdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('BOOLEANO_01') ) as pais_ue , ( SELECT prdt_prmt_pk FROM tbl_parametro_dato_prdt WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_pk = prdt_prvr_pk AND prvr_prmt_pk = srvc_subp_pk AND srvc_fref BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, getSysDatetime()) ) AND prdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('UNLOCODE') ) as unlo_subp_servicio FROM tbl_servicio_dato_srdt srdtLoc join tbl_servicio_srvc ON srvc_pk = srdt_srvc_pk join tbl_parametro_prmt unlo ON prmt_pk = srdt_prmt_pk join tbl_parametro_version_prvr unlo_version ON prvr_prmt_pk = prmt_pk AND srvc_fref BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, getSysDatetime()) JOIN tbl_parametro_dato_prdt unlo_pais ON prdt_prvr_pk = prvr_pk AND prdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('PAIS') WHERE srdtLoc.srdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('UNLOCODE') AND srdtLoc.srdt_srvc_pk = srdtNav.srdt_srvc_pk ) SELECT CASE WHEN pais_codigo = 'ES' THEN CASE WHEN unlo_pk = unlo_subp_servicio THEN 'I'
WHEN unlo_insular = 1 THEN 'CI'
ELSE 'C' END
WHEN pais_ue = 1 THEN 'EC'
ELSE 'E' END AS tipo_navegacion FROM unlo ) ) WHERE srdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('TIPO_NAV_2') AND srdt_srvc_pk = #{value}

UPDATE tbl_servicio_srvc SET srvc_fini = COALESCE( ( SELECT MIN(ssrv_fini) FROM tbl_subservicio_ssrv WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_subservicio_dato_ssdt WHERE ssdt_ssrv_pk = ssrv_pk AND ssdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('ESTADO_ATR') AND ssdt_cadena NOT IN ('A', 'D') ) AND ssrv_srvc_pk = srvc_pk ), srvc_fini) , srvc_ffin = COALESCE( ( SELECT MAX(ssrv_ffin) FROM tbl_subservicio_ssrv WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_subservicio_dato_ssdt WHERE ssdt_ssrv_pk = ssrv_pk AND ssdt_tpdt_pk = getTipoDato('ESTADO_ATR') AND ssdt_cadena NOT IN ('A', 'D') ) AND ssrv_srvc_pk = srvc_pk ), srvc_ffin) WHERE srvc_pk = #{value}
